TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_Hali_Butul, title = Hali_Butul, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hali_Butul} }

S.FORM: Hali Camu Butul (Amilika a kamu: Harry James Potter; ci 哈利 詹姆 波特 ku hulam a kamu) u cay katatenga a tademaw a nisanga'an nu nikakilukilul a cudad, u "Hali Butul" a nikakilukilul a cudad nu misulitay ci JK Luling hananay. u cudacudad nu nisatahatahaw ni Hali Butul, mukilim cinida tu nikatinengan i cinidaan sa, u mapalaway ci Hali Butul, maydih malasakapahayay a mapalaway ci nida, u cudad nu nitanetanengan micudad nida i cacudadan u Hu-ke-wa-ce (Amilika a kamu: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry) sa, hikahetek ni Hali nanilecuh i 1980 a mihecaan 7 a bulled 31 a demoed, u wawa nu mapalaway ci Camu Butul(Amilika a kamu: ) atu Makoay a mapalaway ci Lili Butul, u masacacayay a wawa a tademaw, (masipulu'ay a wawa 獨生子) naspiyan 命運 wayway atu micidekay nida aadihan nida i lalabu nu cudad, u masasibud tu butes ci Hali, mahida tu ci wama nida, u langdaway a kulit ku mata nida, mahida tu ci ina nida; i daw( izaw) ku cacayay a pildac nu duka, mahida u pirat-piyat i zais nida. makudus ku bihid ni Hali, wayway nida nikatinenegan tu midindicu daysan nida u kalisiw nida midindicuay a culay dumaay a tuud maydihay a limecedan == malalitin tu ihekaay atu zumaay a natinengan ==

Hali Camo Botol (Amilika a kamo: Harry James Potter; ci 哈利 詹姆 波特 ko holam a kamo) o cay katatenga a tademaw a nisanga'an no nikakilokilol a codad, o "Hali Botol" a nikakilokilol a codad no misolitay ci JK Loling hananay. o codacodad no nisatahatahaw ni Hali Botol, mokilim cinida to nikatinengan i cinidaan sa, o mapalaway ci Hali Botol, maydih malasakapahayay a mapalaway ci nida, o codad no nitanetanengan micodad nida i cacodadan o Ho-ke-wa-ce (Amilika a kamo: Hogwarts School of Witchcraft and Wizardry) sa, hikahetek ni Hali nanilecoh i 1980 a mihecaan 7 a bolled 31 a demoed, o wawa no mapalaway ci Camo Botol(Amilika a kamo: ) ato Makoay a mapalaway ci Lili Botol, o masacacayay a wawa a tademaw, (masipolo'ay a wawa 獨生子) naspiyan 命運 wayway ato micidekay nida aadihan nida i lalabo no codad, o masasibod to botes ci Hali, mahida to ci wama nida, o langdaway a kolit ko mata nida, mahida to ci ina nida; i daw( izaw) ko cacayay a pildac no doka, mahida o pirat-piyat i zais nida. makodos ko bihid ni Hali, wayway nida nikatinenegan to midindico daysan nida o kalisiw nida midindicoay a colay domaay a tood maydihay a limecedan == malalitin to ihekaay ato zomaay a natinengan ==
